product_name: GarnierSkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water All-in-1 Cleanser & Makeup Remover
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGarnier SkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water All-in-1 Cleanser & Makeup Remover gently cleanses skin, removes makeup and refreshes skin all in 1 step.
details: DetailsBenefitsGarnier micellar water and makeup remover cleanses, removes makeup and refreshes skinMicellar water is paraben-free, fragrance-free, sulfate-free and silicone-freeThis Garnier micellar water can be used to remove eye makeupNo-rinse makeup remover cleanses skinNo harsh rubbingFeaturesOil-free, Paraben-free, Silicone-free, Sulfate-freePackaging may varyItem 2298445How To UseTO REMOVE EYE MAKEUP: Hold pad over closed eyes for a few seconds, then gently wipe without harsh rubbing.TO CLEAN SKIN & REMOVE FACE MAKEUP: Gently wipe all over until skin is completely clean from makeup and impurities. Use daily, AM/PM. No need to rinse.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.IngredientsAqua / Water, Hexylene Glycol, Glycerin, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Disodium EDTA, Poloxamer 184, Polyaminopropyl Biguanide.
how_to_use: TO REMOVE EYE MAKEUP: Hold pad over closed eyes for a few seconds, then gently wipe without harsh rubbing.TO CLEAN SKIN & REMOVE FACE MAKEUP: Gently wipe all over until skin is completely clean from makeup and impurities. Use daily, AM/PM. No need to rinse.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.

reviews.headline: Burns my eyes
reviews.comments: I thought I'd give this makeup remover a try since for years I've used Vaseline. I'm going back to using Vaseline. This product burns every time I use it. I really wanted to love it, since it seems so many people use it.

reviews.headline: Works Great
reviews.comments: Love this makeup remover works great!

reviews.headline: Broke out in a RASH
reviews.comments: Never again will I buy this product it gave me a chemical burn

reviews.headline: Yes, it's as great as they say
reviews.comments: This product removes the makeup very easily and quickly. I really recommend this one because who wants to fight to remove makeup? Not I

reviews.headline: love this product
reviews.comments: this profuct had been continuously recommended to me and i finally decided to give a try! i have no regrets at all and will be repurchasing

reviews.headline: Didn't do much
reviews.comments: I have dryer skin and dont use a lot of makeup. I had to go back to my normal store brand make-up remover because this didnt do much or anything at all really.

reviews.headline: Formula changed? Now it's just glorified liquid soap
reviews.comments: Used it on a cotton pad and while wiping it over my skin, it suds up like soap! I've never had micellar water do this before. Leaves an awful film on my skin. 2 stars because it took off some makeup. Shaking the bottle suds it up like soap!

reviews.headline: Travel Bottle Fail, Not Good at Eyes
reviews.comments: This is effective at removing face makeup, but doesnt do very well with mascara. Although it says it will remove mascara, the bottle also says not to get it in your eyes, which is quite tricky to do. My eyes have become sensitive and it does sting them. Furthermore, the travel bottle is designed exactly like the full size and leaked all over my luggage, staining my leather purse that was in there (it was inside another bag and leaked through). To top it off, the lid on the travel bottle cannot be removed to refill with my larger bottle, creating more unnecessary plastoc waste. Will not repurchase.

reviews.headline: This product is not for combination or oily skin
reviews.comments: This micellar water removes most makeup well but I need to follow up with another cleanser or I will have breakout on my T-Zone. This product would work best for normal to dry skin.

reviews.headline: I would buy this in a heartbeat.
reviews.comments: It takes off makeup WITHOUT a problem

reviews.headline: Ohhhh yesssss
reviews.comments: I love this miceller water!! I get the biggest size for a regular basis and the small one is great for travel. It works great; i use it every night! Works amazing with the garnier eco pads as well!! Oh, and nothing against ulta ( i love you ulta, dont be mad!) but it is wayyyy cheaper at target. Just saying!

reviews.headline: I LOVE this product!
reviews.comments: It really takes off your makeup and feels super nice! if you have sensitive skin i highly recomend!

reviews.headline: Staple
reviews.comments: Take make off and clean face.

reviews.headline: my favorite micellar water!
reviews.comments: this micellar water from garnier is my go to!! it cleanses makeup off the skin with ease, doesn't leave a greasy/sticky residue, and removes every bit of stubborn, waterproof makeup and mascara!! i even use this product on days i need a quick skin refresh. it never feels greasy like it needs to be washed off and you'd be suprised at the amount of excess makeup, dirt, and oil end up on the cotton pad after use. takes off mascara with ease with no pulling or tugging at the eyelid and never leaves eyes burning or dry! highly recommened!

reviews.headline: Garnier Micellar Water
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this micellar water! It removes all of my makeup, and cleanses my face! I highly recommend this product, 100%!

reviews.headline: Daily must-have
reviews.comments: As someone who is quite breakout prone, this micellar water is one product that has become a solid part of my daily routine that has never done me dirty. Haha. I enjoy trying new makeup removers (cleansing oils, other micellar waters, etc.) but always come back to this.

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: I like this as sn eye makeup remover. Use it with reusable cloth.

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: This stuff was really good at removing makeup/dirt. I recommend using cotton rounds with this.

reviews.headline: Great Product!
reviews.comments: I have been using this product forever! I hate the typical oily makeup remover and this is anytning but oily! I love it!

reviews.headline: It Is Nice
reviews.comments: I have dry, insanely sensitive skin. This is good for clearing makeup off my skin, and as a general face cleanser.

faceoff_positive.comments:
Every night before bed I would look at my face and say that I am too tired to wash my face and my face shouldn't even be dirty. This stuff is magical. It's fast & easy. I didn't wear any makeup and wasn't outside at all today and I wiped my face with this product on a cotton pad and this is what it looked like.. NASTY, but atleast the product got my face feeling clean again!! 
P.S- my skin is not oily at all
faceoff_positive.headline: THE BEST PRODUCT OUT THERE!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I was fine with this product when I first used it. It does its job well - cleans your face lightly and smoothly without overdrying. The only problem is that after that first use, my bottle began 'growing' little white flaky colonies of floaters.  I'm surprised this happened. I work in healthcare so I'm well-aware of contamination of bottle products. When I first used the product, I did not touch the opening in any way - I merely poured it on to a cotton ball (did not place the cotton ball in contact with the opening). Still, contamination seems to have occurred. I can only surmise that the floaters are bacteria or something of the like. If anyone else has any insight into this, please let me know. I haven't used the product since that first use. I'm too fearful that the things floating in the water may be harmful to my skin.
faceoff_negative.headline: Ugh, the floaters!
